events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position. Our team will review your materials carefully.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department based on your experience with software development.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your case to guide you through the next steps in the hiring process.
Your skills and background have passed the initial screening. We are impressed by your software engineering experience.
Thank you for your prompt response and availability for the upcoming technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 10th at 10 AM UTC with our senior software engineer.
The technical interview was completed successfully; your problem-solving skills and coding proficiency were highly rated.
We have scheduled your HR interview to discuss company culture and benefits on April 15th.
Your HR interview went well, and the recruitment team is eager to move forward with your application.
We are pleased to propose a formal job offer for the Software Engineer role, detailing salary and benefits.
You have provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining the engineering team.
You have officially accepted the job offer, and we are excited to welcome you to our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started; you will receive access credentials and introductory materials this week.
The recruitment process is now closed successfully as you have joined the company as a Software Engineer.
